content.p: Sutton Bonington sports centre is ideal for students, staff and members of the community based near our rural Sutton Bonington campus. Our sports centre on Sutton Bonington campus houses top range training facilities and acts as the home for several Sutton Bonington student sports clubs. Sutton Bonington sports centre is accessible for our student, staff, alumni and associate members and external booking enquiries. Customers can access Sutton Bonington Sports Centre via College Road. When using a Sat Nav to travel to Sutton Bonington Sports Centre, please use the postcode LE12 5RD. t: +44 (0)115 74 87000 e: sport@nottingham.ac.uk what3words: tragedy.carriage.audio +44 (0)115 748 7000 sport@nottingham.ac.uk Find our opening times here.
